description: black and white print with image of a highly stylized peacock in profile view facing to the right; black background with gradated moon in URC; six plant like shapes run vertically along left section of image; white band runs horizontally along bottom of image; peacock is decorated in various abstract patterns consisting of circles and teardrop shapes
image_copyright: © Mario Avati %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York
inscription: LLC, in pencil: EPREUVE D\'ARTISTE 111/X | LLC, in pencil: (oue Exp)iTION [?]
provenance: The artist’s estate, Paris; his wife; Muriel Sterne, (her sister), Minnetonka, MN
signed: LRC in pencil: Avati 1959 | lower center in pencil: PAON AU ROSEAUX
text: This proud creature is out for an evening walk. Mario Avati, a master of the mezzotint technique, renders the bird’s colorful feathers as an intricate pattern of black and white.
title: Peacock
